Body:
result = self.do_command(self.dev_args + ['displayaddress', '--path',
    'm/44h/1h/0h/0/0'])
self.assertNotIn('error', result)
self.assertNotIn('code', result)
self.assertIn('address', result)
result = self.do_command(self.dev_args + ['displayaddress', '--sh_wpkh',
    '--path', 'm/49h/1h/0h/0/0'])
self.assertNotIn('error', result)
self.assertNotIn('code', result)
self.assertIn('address', result)
result = self.do_command(self.dev_args + ['displayaddress', '--wpkh',
    '--path', 'm/84h/1h/0h/0/0'])
self.assertNotIn('error', result)
self.assertNotIn('code', result)
self.assertIn('address', result)
